source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +5% Damage Reduction when affected by Crowd Control

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Shield Wall for 4.0 sec and gain Luck of the Draw!, which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.
Set: During Luck of the Draw! Shield Slam's chance to critically strike is increased by 75% and its critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Shield Charge by 12.0 sec.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Blast your target with a ball of concentrated flame, dealing 184 Fire damage to an enemy or healing an ally for 184, then burn the target for an additional 75% of the damage or healing done over 6 sec.

Each cast of Concentrated Flame deals 100% increased damage or healing. This bonus resets after every third cast.
Max 2 Charges.

passive_spell_tooltip.description: Your spells and abilities have a chance to cauterize your target for 398 Fire damage over 10 sec or to heal an ally for 398 over 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Reduces the cooldown of Avatar by 10.0%, and increases your Versatility by 3.

When you activate Avatar, immediately heal for 5% of maximum health.

Every 15 sec, gain a Null Barrier, absorbing the next 259 magic damage you take for 10 sec.

When Null Barrier expires, it implodes, dealing Shadow damage equal to the total amount absorbed, divided among all nearby enemies.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Rage spent on them, heal you for 131, and increase your Versatility by 13 for 8 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 7,831 primary stat for 20 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Strength by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Tabard of the Protector

description: For Heroism at the Battle for the Dark Portal
